original_text: Yet the Lord warned Israel and Judah by every prophet and every seer, saying, “Turn from your evil ways and keep my commandments and my statutes, in accordance with all the Law that I commanded your fathers, and that I sent to you by my servants the prophets.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 각 선지자와 각 선견자를 통하여 이스라엘과 유다에게 지정하여 이르시기를 너희는 돌이켜 너희 악한 길에서 떠나 나의 명령과 율례를 지키되 내가 너희 조상들에게 명령하고 또 내 종 선지자들을 통하여 너희에게 전한 모든 율법대로 행하라 하셨으나

sentences.original_text: Yet the Lord warned Israel and Judah
by every prophet and every seer,
and keep my commandments and my statutes,
in accordance with all the Law
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 조상에게 명한 모든 율법대로

sentences.original_text: and that I sent to you by my servants the prophets.”
sentences.korean_translation: 내 종 선지자들을 통해 너희에게 보낸 것이니라
